Description: Lower body sherd of Chian Wild Goat Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior glazed streaky black; exterior, from top: part of dotted concentric circle; maeander frieze between brown bands; part of two rays.
Curator's comments: Although Lemos does not mention this sherd, it ought to be included in her Group of Chalices with Dotted Concentric Circles because of the decoration around the handle zone and between the handles (Lemos 1991, 70).
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0104) (phase 2)
